SEARCH
Package chess.services

Class GameService

java.lang.Object
chess.services.GameService
public class GameService extends Object
The Game Service class handles all requests to the /game endpoint of the API. It interacts with the GameDao to create games, join games, and list games.

  • Method Details

    • joinGame

      public void joinGame(JoinGameRequest request) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Joins a player to a game based on a given JoinGameRequest
      Parameters:
      request - a JoinGameRequest to join a game, which contains the player's AuthToken, player color, and the game id.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - if there is an error accessing the database or if the game position is already taken.

    • createGame

      public CreateGameResponse createGame(CreateGameRequest request) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Creates a new game based on a given CreateGameRequest
      Parameters:
      request - a CreateGameRequest to create a new game, which contains the player's AuthToken and the game name.
      Returns:
      a CreateGameResponse containing the game id of the created game.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - if there is an error accessing the database or the user lacks authorization.

    • listGames

      public ListGamesResponse listGames(AuthToken authToken) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Lists all games that are currently in progress.
      Parameters:
      authToken - the AuthToken of the user that is listing the games.
      Returns:
      a ListGamesResponse containing a list of all games that are currently in progress.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - if there is an error accessing the database or the user lacks authorization.
